name: SnowReportforLostTrail
0:
”Alexa, open Lost Trail”
”Alexa, ask Lost Trail for the snow report”
”Alexa, ask Lost Trail for latest conditions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lost trail
des: The Lost Trail Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions, base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
